content.text:
# Battle of Quatre Bras order of battle

The following units and commanders fought in the Battle of Quatre Bras on 16June 1815 at Quatre Bras in the Belgian region of Wallonia. The numbers following each unit are the approximate strengths of that unit.
Anglo-allied army
Headquarters and support regiments
Field Marshal Arthur Wellesley, Duke of Wellington
Major General Prince Willem of Orange G.C.B.
